attributes.title: I wish there was an option to rate 0 stars
attributes.review: do not download this app! This is the worst app I have ever seen! It is ugly, it is slow, it is glitchy, it caused my phone to spontaneously combust. It would be a very bad shame if more people were to download it and leave one star reviews. The App Store would have no choice but to get rid of the app 😔😔

attributes.title: Terrible!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to support my amazing, not racist, and respectful president. However, when I downloaded the app my phone started to glitch. I think there may be a bug on this app and it may need to be taken down and fixed ASAP. That way I will be able to continue supporting my understanding, Mexican loving, and not orange president.

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I downloaded with the intent of finding a reason to vote for our current president but I cannot find any good reason to vote for this racist, misogynistic, homophobic, anti Semitic, white supremacy supporting rapist, he is just so vile and toxic for our world. I don’t understand how anyone could vote for him. He contradicts himself all the time and yet his supporters say he’s the best president we’ve ever had

attributes.title: Please do no get this app.
attributes.review: I take this very app seriously and I couldn't help but notice that it said it was the presidents app . I was astonished to come to find out that it is was Donald Trump‘s. I’m sorry to to rain on your parade Donald but you don’t qualify to be a “president “. Thank and good night ladies, gentlemen or anything you identify as. I have saved you the time to download this app.

attributes.title: This is app is openly racist and killed my dog
attributes.review: As soon as I clicked download this the app began spewing racial slurs at me. It then took almost 4 days to download all whole still being racist and rendering my phone useless while the app was being loaded. Once it finally finished, I showed the app to my dog and he immediately collapsed dead on the floor. This app MUST be taken down!!’n

attributes.title: My orange baby 🍊
attributes.review: So I got this app to praise my “beautiful” orange president!!!! But I almost got hit by a train!!!! This app is so addictive, and my mom made me eat my cat, now I’m not complaining but like come on, and I e been on this app for so long that my mom kicked me out of my house... but I know my daddy trump will get me back in right? Right? Well ima go and eat my Dino nuggs thanks for the “great” 4 years daddy trump.

attributes.title: NO😫❤️
attributes.review: This app promotes our pedophi—-president !!! this man is dangerous to young girls and young boys and his app should not be so readily available to the hands of our youth!! the app keeps crashing because the orange face is so ugly that the screen just gives up😫 I would give this app 0 stars if i could!!!! this is a danger to our american community!!! apple, you must deport this app immediately!!❤️❤️❤️

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app is just plain bad. In fact, I would like to speak to the manager of this app.  The amount of misinformation included in this app is astronomical. Also, I feel personally attacked by this app because it is just so trash!  What on earth were the developers thinking??? 0 out of 10 would NOT install again!!!!!!

attributes.title: disgusting app🤢
attributes.review: Do not download this app yall. some orange rat kept popping up on the screen for a few hours until I finally got up and smashed my phone 69 times. I couldn’t take it. it was as if that orange rat was mind controlling me. whew chile anyways, after i escaped this horrible app, i marinated my eyeballs in bleach for an hour. just a reminder, do NOT download this app. thanks, blm😌.

attributes.title: Banning Tik Tok
attributes.review: You are banning tik tok so I’m on here to take this app off. Also it’s not just about that it’s a lot of other things that make you not capable of being our president you are supposed to guide us yet you bring America and it’s citizens down. You said Make America great again yet it was already great until you got here say goodbye to the office.
